_comment: This is an annotated configuration example. Remove _comment fields before use.
_comment_networkName: The BSN.cloud network name where the player will be added. Must match exactly.
_comment_packageName: A unique identifier for this setup configuration. Used to identify the setup in B-Deploy.
_comment_setupType: Setup type: 'standalone' for independent players, 'bsn' for BSN-managed content.
_comment_timeZone: Player timezone. Optional, defaults to America/New_York. Examples: 'America/Los_Angeles', 'Europe/London', 'Asia/Tokyo'.
_comment_bsnGroupName: BSN group to assign the player to. Optional, defaults to 'Default'.
_comment_deviceToken: NOTE: Device registration tokens are now AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED by the program via the BSN.cloud Provisioning API. You do NOT need to provide a token in the config file. The program will call POST /Provisioning/Setups/Tokens/ to generate a fresh token (valid for 2 years with 'cert' scope) each time it runs.

network._comment_timeServers: NTP time servers for clock synchronization. Can be multiple servers.

interfaces._comment_id: Unique interface identifier. Standard: 'wired_eth0' for ethernet, 'wifi' for wireless.
interfaces.name: eth0
interfaces._comment_name: Linux network interface name. Usually 'eth0' for wired, 'wlan0' for WiFi.
interfaces._comment_proto: Network protocol: 'DHCPv4' for DHCP, 'Static' for static IP, 'DHCPv6' for IPv6 DHCP.
interfaces._comment_contentDownloadEnabled: Allow content downloads over this interface.
interfaces._comment_healthReportingEnabled: Allow health/status reporting over this interface.

network._comment_interfaces: Network interface configurations. Add multiple entries for multiple interfaces (e.g., wired + WiFi).

_comment_timeout: HTTP request timeout in seconds. Optional, defaults to 30.
